name: Jump 'n' Slide
description:
I can't believe you're actually here. 

Out of the millions (billions?) of pages on the world wide web, you've actually stumbled across my tiny game. That, to me, is amazing.

I'm sorry to say that this game isn't anything spectacular. It's a pretty generic endless runner with janky one-bit pixel art and a hypnotic drum beat.

Hopefully, you'll pay my page a visit again in a couple of years. If you do, maybe I'll have made a game worthy of the significance and cosmic odds of your presence. Until then, I hope you enjoy my tiny little game :)

Oh btw, press UP to jump, and DOWN to slide. Leave a comment to tell me what you think!
